text:
After installation Apache 2.0.47 (Jul 8 2003 22:02:11) as service i am try run 
Apache - "apache.exe -k start". Apache not running and do not tell me about any 
errors. If i try run apache from Control Panel->Administration->Services 
WindowsXP tell me "Error: 3 System can't found specified path".
If i am try run apache without "-k start" command then Apache starting success.

P.S Sorry for my broken English (I am russian)
P.S.S I am using WindowsXP SP1 Russian Edition
creator: nekhoroshkov@mail.ru
robert@profundis.se
text:
This is most likely not a bug, so you should try to post to the user mailing
list (http://httpd.apache.org/userslist.html) to get help.

It sounds as the service installation has gone bad. Try to reinstall the service by:
>apache -k uninstall
then
>apache -k install

Try to set LogLevel to debug, and look in the error log, to see if there is
anything.

creator: slive@apache.org
text: No response from submitter.  Assuming invalid.
